concept.title: Types of Student Addresses at NC State University
concept.shortdesc: NC State University maintains several addresses for students in order to maintain accurate student records and information.

section.title: Student Address Definitions
section.p:
NC State University maintains the following types of addresses for students:
Home Address: This address is used for mailing purposes and should describe the location where you would like to receive your mail. (If you use a PO Box, you may enter that address here.)
Permanent Address: This address persists beyond the student’s attendance at the University. This may be a parent’s address or your permanent address.
Local Address: This address should be the student’s physical living location while attending NC State and where you can be reached in an emergency.
Campus Housing Address: This hsould be the student’s address in a University-managed residence hall or apartment.
Diploma Address: This should be the address to which a student’s diploma will be mailed once the student graduates.
SEVIS Local Address: This should be the student’s local address while at NC State.
SEVIS Foreign Address: This should be the student’s foreign home address.

ul.li: Home address, permenant, and local addresses are required for alll students.
SEVIS Local and Foreign addresses are required for international students.
Please visit International Services for more information.
Campus Housing address is automatically populated for students living in campus housing.
